import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from './services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements { title = 'PMS.UI'; constructor(private auth: AuthService){} logout(){ this.auth.signOut(); } }
